00324 #define DMX_WRAP(_entry, _newfunc, _saved, _actual)                     \
00325 do {                                                                    \
00326     (_saved)->_entry  = (_actual)->_entry;                              \
00327     (_actual)->_entry = (_newfunc);                                     \
00328 } while (0)
00329 
00331 #define DMX_UNWRAP(_entry, _saved, _actual)                             \
00332 do {                                                                    \
00333     (_actual)->_entry = (_saved)->_entry;                               \
00334 } while (0)
00335
